caption.p: Contour plot of three-dimensional surface and two-dimensional plot showing the interaction effect between variables A (Tween80), B (CO:LO), and D (xanthan gum) on droplet size (nm) of the nanoemulsion; C (KMO) and E (water) are kept constant.
Abbreviations: CO, castor oil; LO, lemon essential oil; KMO, kojic monooleate.
